name: Couponslist
body:
# Welcome to Coupons Page
Paytm is a Good web site for online shopping

I have shopping from last one year from paytm, and its a great fun to shop on paytm . Getting good Cash back and offers

for myself paytm is superior to anything others. Be that as it may, the merchants are doing misrepresentation. I asked for to paytm, extortion venders ought to be sent them out for further change.

I brought Shirts from paytm, I booked sized Large yet the wicked merchant send extra large or odd sized cloths these are the dis advantages of paytm Sellers. I am not happy with this type of frauds, Paytm should banned these type of sellers, they are messing paytm' s Image.

Paytm should improve the delivery time as well, Delivery time is very long some time it took a week to deliver the package

I never face problem regarding the payments on paytm.

Customer care support is better then other online websites, there dealing and problem solving is better the others

at long last I asked for to everybody of internet shopping store ought to be watch the merchant what they are doing while sending an item to the clients.

[Paytm Recharge Cashback Offers](http://www.manacoupons.com/paytm-wallet-offers-cashback-promo-code/977/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
